attributes.action: Stop attacks on civilians and hospitals in Gaza
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call upon our MP’s and the Government to
1.        condemn the killing of innocent civilians and attacks upon hospitals by the Israeli armed forces in Gaza, and
2.       take all possible steps to place pressure on Israel to immediately withdraw its troops from Gaza and
3.       urge the government of Israel and the Palestinian Authority to desist from using lethal arms and to urgently agree to a timetable for a genuinely negotiated settlement, based upon the two state solution. “
